intro.heading: Hire Reliable Dump Trucks with Skilled Operators
intro.content: Bellhouse Excavating offers dump truck rental services for contractors, builders, and property owners. Our tri-axle fleet is available with professional operators to haul aggregates, excavation spoil, and demolition debris.
keypoints: Hauling for aggregates, fill, and debris
Ideal for excavation and site development support

items.question: Do trucks come with an operator?
items.answer: Yes, all dump truck rentals include an experienced operator.

items.question: Can I hire trucks by the day?
items.answer: Yes, we offer day rates and project-based pricing.

items.question: Do you supply material as well?
items.answer: Yes, we can both supply and haul aggregates or simply provide hauling for your material.
